alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:17AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northwestern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s and Kent Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 217 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Betterton, or 9 miles southeast of Aberdeen Proving Ground, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Middletown, Centerville, Smyrna, Chestertown, Centreville, Clayton, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Old Town, Glasgow, Newtown, Morgnec, Delaney Corner, Crumpton, Saint Georges, Sassafras and Mount Pleasant. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
